structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Operator of vehicle to drive carefully.

text.section: The operator of any vehicle upon a highway shall operate the vehicle in a careful manner, with regard for the safety and convenience of pedestrians and other vehicles upon the highway.
No person shall willfully operate any vehicle on any highway in such a manner as to injure the highway.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2739g-33, 2739g-35.
